David Joseph , the chief executive of Universal Music, told The Guardian newspaper: Wait is not a word in the vocabulary of the current generation. It's out of date to think that you can build up demand for a song by playing it for several weeks on radio in advance. Matt Cardle , the latest X Factor winner who signed to Sony through an agreement with Simon Cowell , sold 439,000 copies of his song When We Collide after it went on sale immediately after the final.

Thirty-five of the 49 companies in the S&P 500 that reported earnings since Jan. 10 have topped analyst estimates, with General Electric Morgan Stanley and Bank of America Corp. due to release results today. Recent data suggested the economic performance in Europe has been okay, and probably somewhat better than people expected, said Adrian Eric Schmidt , a currency strategist at Lloyd TSB Bank Plc in London. The euro strengthened 0.5 percent against the dollar, and was 0.3 percent stronger versus the yen. The dollar weakened 0.2 percent

, in his resignation statement, insisted he stood by his previous line that he was not aware of phone hacking when he was News of the World editor and said he had done nothing wrong. He said that when a spokesman needs a spokesman, it is time to move on . His resignation follows months of accusations that he had been aware of and sanctioned widespread phone hacking during the period of his editorship of the paper.
